	The camera to be used in this event is Logitech HD 270. For full camera specification, please visit

The camera will be placed in a location such that it covers the entire arena. Live-feed from the camera will be provided to the contestant’s laptop. 
		Detailed arena specifications will be uploaded soon. 
		Game field dimensions are subject to a tolerance of ±5 %. No tolerances will be given in case of maximum bot dimensions. 
		The authenticity of any action not provided in this problem statement shall be subject to discretion of Coordinators. 

Bot Specifications: 
		The robot should be of 25 cm x 10 cm x20 cm in dimensions which will be checked before the event and violation of which will lead to the disqualification of the bot. 
		The potential difference between any two points in the bot should not exceed 12V. 
		The power supply can be on-board or off-board. In case of an external power supply, ensure that the wire remains slack throughout. 
		The camera will be placed in such a way that it covers the entire arena. And live feed from the camera will be given to the contestant's laptop. 
		Onboard cameras and sensors of any kind are prohibited. 
		The robot is allowed to communicate with a computer outside the arena- either wired or wireless. For wired communication, the wire must be slack at every instant of the trial. 
		The team is required to bring their laptop with the necessary software installed. 
		Only Image Processing method is to be followed.
